isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Diesel Engine Diagnostic Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Diagnostic Tools and Accessories - Tools and Accessories - Fuel Test Fitting

svcproc.title: Fuel Test Fitting
svcproc.para: The fuel test fitting is used to measure fuel inlet restriction or fuel pressure.
When measuring fuel inlet restriction, the fitting is installed at the diagnostic port (inlet-side) of the fuel filter housing.
When measuring fuel pressure, the fitting can be installed on the fuel rail instead of the Shrader valve.
The Fuel/Oil Pressure Test Coupler can then be connected to the fuel test fitting to measure fuel pressure or fuel inlet restriction.
